track.name: Sweet Lorraine
comments: let's make this one a dedication to my dear friend Pete <3
I used to play this as a dixieland arrangement.  Fun song.
Gosh has to be my fav nat track......iv jus found joy...classic so romantic.

Nat had an extraordinary career. His early trio work was pioneering and produced lovely tracks, such as this one (Sweet Lorraine). He then went on to compete with the likes of Frank Sinatra, even hosting his own TV show (in an era where there were very few cross-over artists). He had a lovely voice, swung like mad and was a genuine jazz singer. Pity he died relatively young.
That's so cool, this song is for you then XD
Oew,.. my name is Lorraine how nice,.. haha
